api_list.api_description: Get browser, OS, and device information by parsing a user-agent string.

required_parameters.name: ua
required_parameters.description: The user-agent string to be parsed.
required_parameters.default: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36

api_list.api_description: Send a user-agent string inside a JSON object to retrieve browser, OS, and device information.

required_parameters.name: ua
required_parameters.description: The user-agent string to be parsed.
required_parameters.default: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36

query: Can you retrieve the browser, OS, and device information from this user-agent string using both GET and POST methods: 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36'?
